name: mOss (itch) (MrCloudberry)
description:
The theme studied in this game is «reset». Initially, the player can only reset the entire level as a whole. After that, the player gets the opportunity to reset only character's position, which is actively used to solve puzzles.

How to play:

  • Press any button on the start screen to continue;
  • Use arrows to move;
  • Your goal is to step on blue cell;
  • Bump into yellow blocks to push them;
  • Big button on the bottom of the screen restarts level.
